sentences: Ma ei tea sittagi midagi selle kohta.
Ta polnud sittagi kindel oma vastuses.
Sittagi ei olnud ta n√µus minu ettepanekuga.
context: In Estonian, 'sittagi' is an adverb that expresses continuation or persistence up to the present moment. It's similar to English words like 'still', 'yet', or 'even now'. This word emphasizes that something continues to be true or has not changed despite expectations or time passing. It often appears in negative constructions but can also be used with certain verbs to show ongoing action.
